KeyVault.AppId: <AppId of the AAD service principal that can access KeyVault.>
KeyVault.Secret: <Password of the AAD service principal that can access KeyVault.>
KeyVault.IssuingCA: <Name of the issuing certificate in KeyVault.>
KeyVault.CertValidityInDays: <Validity days for certificate - can be from 0 to 365.>

EstAuthentication.EstPassword: <If Auth is Basic, password for server authetication.>
EstAuthentication.EstUser: <If Auth is Basic, username for server authetication.>
